Screens 
  - LoginFragment
  - Users Fragment
  - Add User Fragment


Architecture
  - MVVM Architecture with single Activity and Mutliple Fragments


Technology
   - kotlin
   - Navigation Component
   - Room Database
   - LiveData
   - ViewBinding
